website_summaries.verdict: While it can't compete with more expensive options, this is still a comfortable suit that offers a lot of camouflage choices for the price.
pros: Options here include Desert, Woodland, and ACU Camouflage
Great price for a full suit (hood, jacket, pants, gun wrap), plus a stuff sack
Adjustable hood fully covers neck and head
cons: This suit can take a fair amount of time (hours) to untangle right out of the box
Quality issues here include shedding, cheap construction, and missing buttons

customer_reviews.title: but it worked awesome for my Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: I am a rather large person at 6'5" and about 270 lbs. but it worked awesome for my Halloween costume. The Yeti will reappear again next Halloween!!
customer_reviews.author: TheYeti

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, but requires a lot of untangling. Overall, I'm happy with it though.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this Ghillie Suit, and taking it out of the box, don't freak out when you see it for the first time. Yes, it looks terrible at first. After a couple hours of untangling all the knots though, it looks a lot better. You can see the pre and post tangling pictures attached to this review. When I say a couple hours, I do mean a couple hours...if not several hours. It's not fun, but the suit is cheap... so it's a trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box it looks bad. But put some work into it and comb ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it looks bad. But put some work into it and comb it out with your fingers it and its awesome. Yes your going to lose some yarn off its but that's normal. How good is it? I was able to stalk a ground hog standing up with my cross bow it get in a 20 foot shot. He didn't know where I was but just could smell me. It blended in perfectly. i had hesitated for about a year in buying this. but I'm glad i brought it. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Battlefield tested
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! My 14 year old son loves this! We live in the country so it's very popular for the neighborhood boys to play "battlefield" and my son now is the one "surviving" the longest because his friends just can't find him! He loves it and would probably sleep in it if I let him!

customer_reviews.title: Good camouflage.
customer_reviews.text: Purfect purchase for my grandson. Could not have been a better gift! He is the envy of his friends. Comes with a stuff bag to store it. Strings fall off, but he he plays hard in it. He is 11, and taller for his age so bought him a men's large. Fits well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: tami alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I'm not a hunter so I have no idea why I bought it, other than to scare the kids but Halloween is coming so maybe I'll use this as my costume. You definitely have to comb out the strings and yes some do fall off but this was ~$40 vs others that were upwards of $300 and I'm sorry but that is way too much money. I'm 5'7" and ~185lbs and this fit perfect! After a few hours of combing out the strings and fluffing them up, its night and day from when it arrived. A+ purchase
customer_reviews.author: iluvdabeer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great suit except for where the elastic is put in the belly of the jacket. The elastic is put in between two buttons not by the button. So the elastic stretches and pulls the fabric apart between the two buttons creating a gap. If the elastic was put right bedside the button, it would not be able to pull apart and there wouldn’t be a gap. I ordered a second suit to compare the 2 and they were both the same.
customer_reviews.author: Andy’s Music

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing! I've been working on untangling this suit for awhile now. A ton of thread isn't even stitched onto the suit and it just comes right off. The idea is to remain concealed from the enemy, not leave a trail of string behind for them to find you.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Cool suit— great also for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a Halloween costume for my 12 year old and it was a hit! Everyone loved it and he looked pretty awesome! It seems sturdy and like it will last for a while! Ps I included one of his “photo bombs” that someone sent me after the church party— he was having so much fun sneaking around!
customer_reviews.author: A. Marcroft

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was very disappointing very cheaply made gaps in between layers of the suit head mask couldn't even fully conceal head just a waste of money opened it and put it back in the box for return in less than 1 min would not reccomend buying it unless you want a cheap one for Halloween bit even then the price is still to high for that
customer_reviews.author: white buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews were right, you’ve got to hand-comb the suit to get it to fill out. After that, it goes on easy and is fairly breathable. Does get a bit hot inside but not too bad. Looks great, my own dog got scared when I stood up cause she didn’t notice me. You do lose pieces of the string/yarn as you go, but that seems hard to avoid with this kind of suit. Would recommend for hunters, Halloween, and doomsday enthusiasts
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for hunting. He loves it. It surprised me as a retired Army, this is a very nice suit for the price. I've seen other suits for three times this price that are not as good as this. I plan to buy a second one for me to use. And for a bonus, from a distance it looks like bigfoot so you can use it for your you tube videos!
customer_reviews.author: Joemama.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Not bad at all for the brice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and recieved it fast. The pants and the jacket are OK material and they are Light, you can compress them so easy. The hood is perfectly solid. I was surprised with the quality and price. I'm 6.4 and it fit with more room. Just because it is new some of the ashes fall off, but that because the storage. Haighly Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: majic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase. While untangling (which took a while
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase. While untangling (which took a while, but whatever - do it while listening to music) barely any strings came out. I played hide & seek with my siblings to see if it holds out, and hell yea it does. This thing can make you practically invisible in certain areas. Haven't used it on the field yet though. The wrap for the weapon covers the iron sights for my VSS so I can't quite use it, however You can either make it so only the bottom half is covered, or buy a scope which is what I'll hopefully be doing. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for. (Go pay more for a better product)
customer_reviews.text: I got mine and it looked fine but as i gently spread apart the threading chunks would fall out and a few bald spots were on it. The top of the hood/headpiece was also really bald and doesnt have any thread to blend it. The only good part is the easy way that you put it on, the shirt uses push on buttons and the pants are like really loose sweat pants.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Hythier

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit.
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours untangling it (kind of fun) it looks nice and full. I got the XL version and it allows for some of my gear to fit inside of it, but I'd recommend buying two and making a ghillie suit for your tactical gear. This stuff should work out well when I go hunting. Remember to add lots of leaves and such from your local surroundings so it blends in even more.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I am now invisible
customer_reviews.text: I'm am now invisible and can do as I please. Perfect for stalking your neighbors or grocery shopping. Wear it for your wife as a kink outfit if shes into tree people. Definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Most ghillie suits can cost upwards of $100. It comes packaged in a nice small bag. It was a little matted down at first but once you work the knots out it works great. I’ve managed to be within feet of deer in the woods using this and have gone completely unnoticed. Works great for what I wanted it for. Might look into buying the snow one next time. I purchased the woodland camo first. Would buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s good but the only issue I have is it claims to be breathable but laying down at night felt a bit warm for me. Even just sitting down at a table felt a little warm. The visor was a turn off for me just because I prefer my face not to be visible, but I’m picky so I’m still giving this a good review.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Halloween Ever
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for Halloween and it was a hit. Everyone in the family wanted a chance to wear it. It did take a while to untangle it and get it just right, but once we did it was great. We could hide in plain site by and tree and no one realized anyone was there. We got so many scares and laughs out of this. My five year old even scared the dog just wearing the top and the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Evin Knight

customer_reviews.title: Very good ghillie suit - reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It is a very decent ghillie suit for a reasonable price. Initially it helps the suit if you untangle the strings so they give more even complete coverage. Yes, it does take an initial investment in time to untangle but in the end you will have a very nice ghillie suit for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for Hunting and it works so well! You turn basically invisible in the right environment. I would recommend limiting your movement in this suit as the strings that make up the camo get caught and pull out very easily. Also the face mask is not the easiest to see through, but it does work well. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great in pictures, disappointing in person.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this ghillie suit, in pictures it looked great. However when I got it, I was disappointed. first off, it was turned inside out. I could see how it would be easier to pack that way, but all it did was tangle the crap out of it, and trying to untangle it just ripped out clumps of the strands. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for the Hunter in Your Life
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my Father in Law as a joke Christmas gift, and he loved it! He goes hunting every so often, and we had joked about him getting a Ghillie Suit. The price of the suit was perfect, and it fit him like a glove. Still waiting to see him use it though for more than scaring the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, but has its flaws
customer_reviews.text: This ghillie suit does the camo job quite well for the price, but has two flaws with it. Firstly, all the strings are in bundles together. Therefore, when you first receive it, it's not ready to go. You have to meticulously straighten all the strings across the entire suit. Second problem is when you're deep in the woods and you go prone on the ground. All the leaves and debris get stuck and tangled in the strings. It's quite a pain to clean it out afterward. If you can handle the extra maintenance for the great price then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Safiran

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality/price combination you can find
customer_reviews.text: Great product, comes in a convenient bag with straps. Great quality, similar to the military grade suits I’ve seen while serving active duty. Can’t beat the quality/price combo. I have not field tested the item but I soon will for turkey season. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: TacticalStoreUSA

customer_reviews.title: not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Because of the light weight and tangle tear and sticking of this suit - it can only be worn in open field where you won't stick to things. The threads on the suit fall off at the slightest touch. It won't last the season and we are not going to recommend it to others. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Now you seem me, now you don't
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhh, this year was a great year to scare kids in Holloween. Had many kids and people scream and a few crying babies. Mean you say, but you know nothing beats a good scare on holloween. Great costume and you know secretly they loved it and went home to tell about it.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what all the negative reviews are about on here. I bought 2 and they're good enough quality for the money. They snag on brush, briers, and everything else, but what do you expect if you're walking around the woods with a hairy Sasquatch outfit on. Best solution for snags, carry out to your sit, then put on. Very pleased with the way you disappear in the natural surroundings. Crows never noticed us until the gun fire started, by then it was way past to late. Crow carcasses began to accumulate...lol Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit large but good. I ended up removing the bottom most string material from the legs because the first use was in wet weather. So the bottom of both legs became giant mud balls. Once I did that they tucked nicely in my boots and worked perfectly in the mud as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: The best camouflage I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the Ghillie suit. The best camouflage I’ve ever purchased, I wish the carry bag was a little bigger it took some time to unfold the hat And to reshape it after being stuck in the Little stuff bag The best camouflage I’ve ever purchasedo complain about very happy with it, I will certainly buy it again they shipped it to me fast very happy, no complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lecocq

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have made for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made for airsoft. I am beyond pleased with this. Pros: Light Weight. Easy to put on over clothing. Breaths really well and allow a breeze to flow through. Well Built. Cons: Other than having to brush it out when you first get it I can't think of any.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Connor

customer_reviews.title: Bought for halloween costume.
customer_reviews.text: Son bought it for costume. It is light weight, and he is 6 foot 2 and 240. and wore over sweats , was a bit tight on chest, buts he has very broad shoulders, I am not sure how well it would fit over jacket for bug guys who want it for hunting...
customer_reviews.author: Advocate Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted 1 of each until I bought 1. The suit itself is ok but the outer shell is what counts. Not so good. Poorly made falls apart I put it on 2 times never went anywhere and the stuff just comes off. I would really like this item if it didn't fall apart. 40 something bucks is too much. I wouldn't pay more than $25 for it. So I guess I won't be getting another. Too bad .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I bought because we had a huge bay window you could look straight into our kitchen from the road and since I have certain imagine I need to remain intake, I thought what’s more bad ass than ghillie suit?! Turns out quite a bit, but not for the price, so ghillie suit it was. I haven’t got the chance to play with it in the woods yet, because poison ivy loves me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk..... material is all junk..... all it's good for it a costume.....
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, started falling apart as soon as opened, not enough fabric strands
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: For Halloween only
customer_reviews.text: This Gilly suit, has very little camouflage strings. But if it’s for a Halloween you’re a live. It takes a long time to straighten out each and every strand of Strank, it’s almost impossible to straighten out for coverage
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Almost invisible to deer
customer_reviews.text: For the money, really good buy. Amazing how deer will be right under the tree and can pick you out. Had to cut out mesh over eyes since it's a bit too dark. Need to wait until at destination when walking in woods, otherwise catches on everything. BUT, it does the job if you are looking to hide your silhouette from deer.
customer_reviews.author: otter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My son and love this suit. My son wore it for Halloween. We recieved so many compliments from security guards to police officers to teachers . Everyone was talking about his costume. The adults enjoyed the suit more then the kids . Excellent costume ! my son loved being center of attention .
customer_reviews.author: Lovelyag

customer_reviews.title: What's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I bought it for hunting and was so excited since it really made me invisible in the brush to the eye. Unfortunately it is NOT invisible to the nose! After a year and multiple soaks in Oxy-Clean, Scent Blocker, Dreft, and others, there is still an odor that will scare every critter within 1/2 a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for winter predator hunting, I make my own ghillies for work, but wanted a cheap one for predator hunting I can bang up. Was impressed with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Very realistic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20 yr old son. He loves it! Very realistic! I bought it for him to use hunting but he’s having a ball hiding and scaring various family and friends. It is well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieN.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a top of the line ghillie suit. But, remember you are not paying top dollar for it. This is an outstanding value for the price. If you have ever wanted one this is a great piece to start with before you graduate to a top quality & expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Came a little matted, but over all looks and fits well. I bought this for turkey hunting, but I was so busy I withered through the whole season. It'll get a bigger test next year or maybe deer season. But mainly I just want to pretend to be a sniper. Hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Everette M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The camo threads are not very secure and tend to pull out when handling. ( You get what you pay for.) Some complain of leaves and debris tangling in the fiber. I roll mine in the leaves and add a natural scent to the suit. Critters come within inches of me.
customer_reviews.author: harley_diva07

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. To untangle I zip tied the pieces to hangers, grabbed the "clumps" of threads and pulled them apart horizontally.. Then lightly "combed" with my fingers. Took about 30 minutes is all.
customer_reviews.author: AndyO

customer_reviews.title: This suit is really awesome. I bought it as a halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: This suit is really awesome. I bought it as a halloween costume, but I'd feel comfortable giving it to a soldier who was in wooded combat. It's a bit of a pain to loosen up out of the box, but if you take ten minutes and comb the threads with your fingers, it'll be right as rain. I was goofing around a few months back and I was able to hide from my dog in the backyard. He loses his mind if he sees a speck of dust fall, so I feel pretty confident recommending this suit. Beyond that, it's just kind of cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy Platinum

customer_reviews.title: despite all the wear and tear it is is still in great condition, and being used today
customer_reviews.text: Worked for Halloween, worked for paintball, worked for hide and seek. My 11 year old son loves it and has gotten way more use out of it then any other halloween costume we have had. despite all the wear and tear it is is still in great condition, and being used today.
customer_reviews.author: Coach David

customer_reviews.title: Husbands happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it. You will have a ton of fall out when trying to fluff out from the package. But it serves its purpose and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm female, 5'10, 185 lbs. With a long "wing span" Bought a large, still quite big on me. My son has also tried it who is 6'1" fits his leg length and arms perfectly
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Quality is marginal
customer_reviews.text: The suit looks great and my son loves it but the strings (whatever you call them) seem to fall off pretty easily. For the price I wish it were a bit more durable. However, my son does love it and uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Fool

customer_reviews.title: Covers my big frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL-XXL size. I am 6’4” 290lbs and this fits me with no gaps in coverage. I’m going to add locale foliage to blend in more. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: La Mejor

customer_reviews.title: Y
customer_reviews.text: Haven't use yet but arrived quickly and as described fits good had a lot of lose string s with package haven't used yet will rate when I do. Trying to rate difert product right now and when I click on that product rate button this product keeps popping up
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Its a great purchase and a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. its not very hot and I wear glasses, So the cap works very good. Thank you! perfect! Just what I wanted! Also its very easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. We use this for paintballing and it continuously gets stuck on lens sticks and small items and tears pieces out of it other than that it does do a pretty decent job for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jason w.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: The ducks didn't know what hit the this season, first time I've not used a maimai (duck blind) and I didn't need one wearing this. Added very little weight, only thing I'd change is when using with over the ear hearing protection, use some velcro to secure the hood to the top band of the ear muffs to stop the hood tipping forward and obstructing your view. Otherwise, 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t hunt or anything but I bought this to hide during Halloween and scare the trick or treaters as they came up to the house. This thing worked amazing. I had people standing inches in front of my face and they had no idea I was standing there until I jumped out at them! So worth the money spent!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solid reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ghillie suit for several years use at hunting quite often it has definitely held up
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Luther

customer_reviews.title: It is bad Material!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think you shouldn't get this suit because everything sticks to it. It mad me so Mad!! I tried to take the leaves and sticks off but it just got even more stuck and almost ripping it. The only reason I put 2 stars instead of 1 is because it looks kind of cool.
customer_reviews.author: Yelp

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!! I’m warning you
customer_reviews.text: I never received the whole suit! Just the top missing the other parts and the twill falls out and the twill is spaced really far apart it’s completely trash
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Durec

customer_reviews.title: Halloween fave
customer_reviews.text: Great ghillie suit, had to order a smaller size for my son how’s 12, overall good quality
customer_reviews.author: MrsZat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to wear for Halloween and hide from the trick or treaters. Surprisingly, super lightweight & comfortable!! Would def recommend this if you are looking to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took 15 days. The pants and gun wrap are not in this package. Don’t order this.
customer_reviews.author: Farra Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old for Halloween. He's 5'9" and weighs 135 lbs. fits slightly big but that's how you want it. Could definitely use more strings in certain areas but overall it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for air soft or paintball wars!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my air soft rifle shooting son and his battles with friends. He truest enjoyed it and it is still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Scared the crap out of my wife , material isn’t that great but it gets the job done for the money
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great quality and will definitely refer other hunters this suit. Pros: light, durable, great patterns. Too many Pros to list Cons: took a little while to prep (not really a con, just separates the lazy from the realistic people )
customer_reviews.author: Twistersdaze

customer_reviews.title: Overall Solid
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it, fits me 6' 2'' 180 lbs. only downside is it sheds a bit. Feels like a solid build and decent in summer heat but need to wear a face shield under it to hide your face and eyes better behind the mesh, less visible to others when you put your head down. Make sure to spread it out before using it in airsoft or hunting
customer_reviews.author: Alec S.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints! Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this for hunting. This one was much more affordable than we could find locally. It looks great and fits great, maybe a little on large side, but that's prob good because you can wear lots of layers underneath. Comes with a handy camo drawstring bag for storage which is great because I wasn't looking forward to this hanging in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stevens

customer_reviews.title: you can't see me
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars, but the head cover is small and not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was not expecting this high of quality for 40 bucks. Fits great, looks great, nothing negative to say. This is an easy add to cart and enjoy. Wish they sold accessories for my pellet gun to camo that up too. Anyways, it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the hunter
customer_reviews.text: My son thought it was great. Could have had a little fuller dropping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! It was good quality and everything he ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a requested Christmas gift for my son, who is 14. He loved it! It was good quality and everything he wanted it to be. He wore it everywhere we went that day and slept in it a few times. I was very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Thought we were getting a youth size and received an adult size. Made it work for a Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Fits n great Camo enough strings for the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly Fits n great Camo enough strings for the job , haven't lost a Air soft Match ever since thanks guys keep up the Good work
customer_reviews.author: EdgarGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband, it is exactly what he wanted & loves it. He has been busy untangling this, but besides all this extra work, it is perfect. I would buy again, if he needed another. FAST shipping. Perfect. It looks 100% better when untangled.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Kirchhof

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: Very cool Ghillie suite. Well made, doesn't shed like other ghillie suit reviews, does require some fluffing up as expected. Nice bag to store. Big hit at Halloween party. Would definitely use for hunting or paintball/airsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Link888

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. His friends have games in the woods and it is great
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Ghillie Suite
customer_reviews.text: make sure you put some time to untangle the uniform. great, awesome, breathable and good fit. thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: The snow ghost
customer_reviews.text: Thus is the best investment ever I've been scareing the neighborhood like crazy with this thing I'm pretty sure my neighbors havent left there house in a few days cause everytime they do I come running out of the woods in this suit and as soon as I run back to the woods and lay down no one can find me I become invisible
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: You have to fluff it a little bit to get it looking right but it's one for my favorite peices for ground hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: It allows you to hide in the bushes very well
customer_reviews.author: Clifford James Green Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Rocked it for Outdoor Paintball!
customer_reviews.text: Was a huge success for paintballing out in the woods! Surprising, it wasn't as heavy/hot as I expected. The liner is a breathable mesh material which was great for the heat! It does catch on bushes easily though lol
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves them, Got a deer first time wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband Loves them, Got a deer first time wearing them after going out 2 previous times an got nothing , Well worth the money an fit as they should, He can't wait to go turkey hunting with them,,.
customer_reviews.author: Patty T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and easy to store. I like the overall look but you do need to rack out the tangles and a good amount does fall off in the process but your not gonna get spotted from the bit that comes off. It’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to comb it out but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: anthony stonecipher

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The suit is better than I expected for the price but I fee like it needs more of the material stitched in and more spread out but haven't had a chance to test it in the field. The hole for the face I feel needs to be a tad smaller because it sticks out like a sore thumb but adding some forage might help.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Messman

customer_reviews.title: Hide like a sniper
customer_reviews.text: Probably pretty decent suit for the money, but I haven't put it side by side with an expensive one. The strings are a little thin, but the coverage seems adequate.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Not great but it works
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look as nice as the picture, the "grass" is really sparse in places and it has a bad habit of picking up debris.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: You will disappear!
customer_reviews.text: Suit is excellent camouflage, light weight, easy to put on or take off, not too warm. Head gear can be difficult to see out of but not by much. Excellent quality for the price. In the photo attached is my son wearing the suit and sitting next to a bush. If it weren't for his shoes he would be one with the forest in this.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce guariglia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says it is . No complaints
customer_reviews.author: B.L.Shatto

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product it works very well have used it during deer season
customer_reviews.author: Elbert E Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured, cheap chinses crap made for selling not for using
customer_reviews.text: This hunk of junk has less than half of the camo material shown in the photo. It is falling off the mesh base. Cheaply made, horrible quality and the camo material barely cover the suit. . Will be lucky to wear it twice. Thanks for NOTHING! BUY SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.author: C. Burbul

customer_reviews.title: My so wanted this as a halloween costume so it ...
customer_reviews.text: My so wanted this as a halloween costume so it is a little big for him but we expected that he' s a tall 10 year old. It is made well. He plays in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little suit. I cut the mesh outta the mask, otherwise it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Dyer

customer_reviews.title: ... price and what you get you are getting a good buy. It's light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price and what you get you are getting a good buy. It's light weight and easy to use, breathable material so bundle up underneath when it's cold. All said I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14yr. old & fits great (size M/L). Very good camouflage & fabric is thin, so you don't get too hot & it's light weight. The way it arrived was a little difficult b/c it arrives inside out. It also is too big for all of it to fit inside the storage bag they send with it. All in all, still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hart

customer_reviews.title: rad
customer_reviews.text: looks great after some grooming and fits well. im 6'4" 300lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early
customer_reviews.text: Great gillie suit,Great price.I will use this to coyote hunt.Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: levi2124

product_meta.title: Red Rock Outdoor Gear - Ghillie Suit
product_meta.description:
The industry standard for ghillie suits, the Red Rock Outdoor Gear 5-Piece Ghillie Suit, offers superior comfort and convenience. Our suit is designed to go on quickly over clothing and allow direct access to pockets underneath making it ideal for layering. The dense ghillie material provides effective camouflage in a lightweight package which is suitable for hunting in numerous environments. The pants have an elastic waist and a drawstring to offer a comfortable, custom fit. To go on easily over boots, the pants have snap closures on the outer seam near the ankle. A drawstring-equipped hood covers the entire head and neck. The gun wrap has elastic and a drawstring which allows it to cover an average size shotgun or rifle. The entire ghillie suit fits into the included stuff sack.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :16.2 x 7.1 x 10.1 inches; 1 Pounds
 * Manufacturer recommended age :14 years and up
 * Item model number :70915XL/XXL
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :August 15, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Red Rock Gear
 * ASIN :B008Y1V69Q

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #16,413 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #24 inMen's Hunting Clothing 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars1,232 ratings The industry standard for ghillie suits, the Red Rock Outdoor Gear 5-Piece Ghillie Suit, offers superior comfort and convenience. Our suit is designed to go on quickly over clothing and allow direct access to pockets underneath making it ideal for layering. The dense ghillie material provides effective camouflage in a lightweight package which is suitable for hunting in numerous environments. The pants have an elastic waist and a drawstring to offer a comfortable, custom fit. To go on easily over boots, the pants have snap closures on the outer seam near the ankle. A drawstring-equipped hood covers the entire head and neck. The gun wrap has elastic and a drawstring which allows it to cover an average size shotgun or rifle. The entire ghillie suit fits into the included stuff sack.
feature_bullets: 5-Piece Ghillie Suit includes: jacket, hood, pants, gun wrap, and stuff sack with carry strap
Easy On/Off: Elastic pant waist with drawstring; Elastic jacket cuffs; Adjustable chin strap in hood; Easy snap-closure jacket; Snap-closures at ankles
Stitched opening in ghillie pants and jacket allows access to pockets underneath
Available Sizes: M/L (Chest 42”- 48”; Waist 32” - 38”) LRG/XLRG (Chest 48”- 56” ”; Waist 38”- 46”)
Lightweight and breathable polyester construction; 98% polyester 2% spandex
The 5 Piece Ghillie Suit includes hood; jacket; pants; gun wrap; and a stuff sack
Available in Medium Large Chest 42-Inch 48-Inch Waist 32-Inch 38-Inch or X Large 2X Large Chest 48-Inch 56-Inch Waist 28-Inch 46-Inch
